item.title: [SPARK-6694] SparkSQL CLI must be able to specify an option --database on the command line.
item.description:
SparkSQL CLI has an option --database as follows.
But, the option --database is ignored.

$ spark-sql --help
:
CLI options:
    :
    --database <databasename>     Specify the database to use
```
item.summary: SparkSQL CLI must be able to specify an option --database on the command line.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
